entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 2:31PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...High Water Levels Likely Through This Week... Warm temperatures across the eastern Interior, combined with a much above normal snowpack over higher elevations, is causing a significant increase in snowmelt. Runoff into rivers south of the Brooks Range is causing water levels to rise and breakup to begin on many rivers. Local ice jams may form and result in elevated
